title: Home
text: PhD candidate at HKU REC. Research interests: REITs, government behaviors, machine learning. Personal links to mail, Google Scholar, LinkedIn, ORCID, Bilibili, CV, hobbies.

title: Research
text: Research listing page showing featured projects across subfolders with categories and dates.

title: Market Concentration, Market Power, and Firm Growth of Construction Companies
text: Study of 37 Chinese construction firms (2009–2018); examines market concentration (CR) and market power (MP) effects on turnover and profit using Cobb–Douglas and OLS. Finds concentration boosts turnover and profit; market power boosts profit but reduces turnover; advantages for non-SOEs with overseas income or civil engineering focus.

title: Housing Policy and Housing Return: Evidence from Chinese Housing Market
text: NLP-based policy index from 2008–2024 documents; identifies loosening/tightening periods. Loosening measures linked to higher long-term housing returns; effects transmitted mainly via supply and demand channels; asymmetric Granger causality shows delayed policy impact on returns.

title: Teaching
text: Teaching assistant: RECO3038 Real Estate Investment and Finance (Undergraduate); RECO6069 Real Estate Investment (Postgraduate).

title: Resources
text: Links for monetary policy (PBoC, National Interbank Funding Center, China Bond), Stata (Lianxianghui), Python (Liaoxuefeng).
